page.title: 05CHATTENDEN BARRACKS
page.content: Chattenden Barracks was opening in 1966.It is part of the Royal School of Military Engineering whose HQ. is at Brompton Barracks on the other side of the River Medway.Chattenden is the home of 12 RSME Regiment.Also based at Chattenden is 33 Engineer Regiment (E.O.D.).They are at Lodge Hill and run independent of 12 RSME Regiment. 12 RSME is the main regiment at Chattenden. It is a training regiment for both officers and men. One of its special roles is the training of young engineering officers who have just passed out of Sandhurst. 12 RSME is composed of four squadrons. 17 Squadron looks after all the vehicles used by 12 RSME and provides all the drivers some of whom are Royal Engineers, some WRAC and the rest civilian. It has its own wokshops and its own mechanics.
